name: Gorilla Diamond
description: Gorilla Diamond Inc. will disrupt the business model of crypto Corporations by leading the way with profit-sharing to all their token holders - from company developments to various initiatives within divisions of the corporation. Gorilla Diamond’s CEO, Ahmad Hassan, believes in bridging the gap between dividend-making stocks in the outside world and profit sharing token models in the crypto world – to bring them to one reality. Gorilla Diamond Inc. is creating the peer-to-peer Diamond Service Market which is planned to begin development in Q3 and launch to the public in Q4 of 2021.
